patterns: What do you know about freshers welcome?
Can you give me information about freshers welcome?
What do I need to know about freshers welcome?
responses:
Freshers welcome is a programme organised by the Christian Union for all freshers in the University of Benin. 
 Kamdela Mandeke is the theme for this year's freshers welcome.

patterns: What is the meaning of Kamdela Mandeke?
Do you know what Kamdela Mandeke means?
responses:
Kamdela Mandeke is the theme for this year's freshers welcome in the Christian Union. 
If you want to know what Kamdela Mandeke means, kindly come to freshers welcome 2023.  
The meaning of Kamdela Mandeke will be revealed during freshers welcome programme

Freshers welcome is a programme organised by the Christian Union for all freshers in the University of Benin.

patterns: Each lines on the tennis court means whats?
Why are there so many lines on the tennis court?
where is the base line on the tennis court, What do the tennis court lines mean?
responses:
Baseline - The baselines are the lines on either end of the court that determines the boundaries of play going lengthwise. They are also where a player serves behind.
Center Mark - The center mark determines the two halves of the tennis court. It mainly helps with service to determine where a player should stand prior to serving.
Center Line - The center line divides the two service boxes into a distinct left service box and right service box on either side of the court. Landing a serve on the line is considered good.
Net - The net stands 3 feet and 6 inches high where the posts lie while the middle of the net is 3 feet tall, with the posts 3 feet outside of the court on either side. Hitting a ball into the net is considered an out while any ball that hits the net cord and falls onto the other side is considered good except for a serve, which allows for a re-do, or let.
Service Line - The service line separates the forecourt from the back court, and it also marks the length of the service box.
Singles Sideline - The singles sideline is the innermost line running lengthwise and determines the boundary of play for singles matches as well as the width of the service box.
Doubles Sideline - The doubles sideline is the outermost line running lengthwise and is only used in doubles matches.

patterns: How do you decide who serve first?
responses: A flip of the coin or spin of the racket, known as the toss, determines which player or team serves first. If called correctly, the player or team that did so chooses who serves first. The player/team who did not call it correctly decides which side of the court they want to play on first.

patterns: I am a fresher, am I invited to kamdela mandeke?
Am I invited to freshers welcome?
responses:
Yes, you are invited to freshers welcome. This programme is specially organised for you, and do not forget to invite your friends as well. 
Do you want to know something else?
There will be gifts for the first 100 freshers.

patterns: That is great but, when and where is freshers welcome holding?
responses:
Freshers welcome is holding in both campuses of the university- Ugbowo and Ekehuan.
 Ekehuan campus: Tuesday, 4th April 2023 @ Part-time Hall.
 Ugbowo campus: Wednesday, 5th April 2023 @ Festus Iyayi Hall.

patterns: Where does Christain Union holds service?
responses:
Christain Union holds her fellowship on Sundays in both campuses of the university.
 Ekehuan- DPA2 by 9:30am.
 Ugbowo- All Saints's Multipurpose hall by 3pm.

patterns: What year was the Christian Union established?
responses: The Christain Union was founded in 1970
